channel.title: If I use my comps ip?
channel.description: I have one question before I open my server up to the public. If I use my ip that I run the server off of now will that endanger my computer? If it will how do I use that no-ip.org stuff?

item.title: If I use my comps ip?
item.dc:creator: @ownageownt ownageownt
item.description:
@ownageownt wrote:

No-Ip is a lot better actually. Just use it, it’s not that bad.

Read full topic

item.source: If I use my comps ip?

item.title: If I use my comps ip?
item.dc:creator: @runeshawn11 runeshawn11
item.description:
@runeshawn11 wrote:

Not sure if it will endanger your comp. But how to use no-ip. First, go to no-ip.com. Then register there. Download the no-ip duc. Then go to your no-ip cp and make a new no-ip. Then update it in the no-ip duc you downloaded. If you didnt under stand that. look at the how to make a server guide in tutorials, it tells you how to do it.

Read full topic
item.source: If I use my comps ip?
